definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: AF Flight No.123 is checking in at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 法航123号航班正在办理登机手续。

sentences.english: Air France passengers are treated to a delectable spread and smiling service.
sentences.chinese: 法航的旅客享用机上美食，并和空姐微笑交谈。

sentences.english: Air France spokesman said several of the plane`s mechanisms had malfunctioned.
sentences.chinese: 据法航发言人透露，失踪客机曾发生多处机械故障。

sentences.english: On Friday, the judge will decide whether Air France should also face investigation.
sentences.chinese: 周五，法官将决定法航是否也应该接受调查。

pinyin: Fa3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1
